member.name: T:AssetsController
member.summary: API controller for managing assets, including stocks, bonds, and funds.

member.name: M:AssetsController.GetAllAssets
member.summary: Retrieves all assets across all portfolios.

member.name: M:AssetsController.GetAsset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a single asset by its ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the asset.
member.response: If the asset is not found

member.name: M:AssetsController.GetAssetsByPortfolioId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves all assets belonging to a specific portfolio.
member.param: The unique identifier of the portfolio.
member.returns: A list of assets for the given portfolio.
member.response: If no assets are found for the portfolio

member.name: M:AssetsController.CreateStock(StockCreateDto)
member.summary: Creates a new stock asset.
member.param: The stock creation data.

member.name: M:AssetsController.CreateBond(BondCreateDto)
member.summary: Creates a new bond asset.
member.param: The bond creation data.

member.name: M:AssetsController.CreateFund(FundCreateDto)
member.summary: Creates a new fund asset.
member.param: The fund creation data.

member.name: M:AssetsController.UpdateAsset(System.Int32,AssetDto)
member.summary: Updates an existing asset.
member.param: The unique identifier of the asset to update.
The updated asset data.
member.response: If the asset is not found

member.name: M:AssetsController.DeleteAsset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes an asset by its ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the asset to delete.
member.response: If the asset has existing transactions
If the asset is not found

member.name: T:CustomersController
member.summary: API controller for managing customers and their associated portfolios.

member.name: M:CustomersController.GetAll
member.summary: Retrieves all customers in the system.

member.name: M:CustomersController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific customer by ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the customer.
member.response: If the customer is not found

member.name: M:CustomersController.GetWithPortfolios(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a customer along with their portfolios and associated assets.
member.param: The unique identifier of the customer.
member.returns: The customer details including portfolios and assets.
member.response: Returns the customer with portfolios and assets
If the customer is not found

member.name: M:CustomersController.Create(CustomerCreateDto)
member.summary: Creates a new customer.
member.param: The customer creation data.

member.name: M:CustomersController.Update(System.Int32,CustomerUpdateDto)
member.summary: Updates an existing customer.
member.param: The unique identifier of the customer to update.
The updated customer data.
member.returns: No content if the update was successful.
member.response: If the customer is not found

member.name: M:CustomersController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a customer by ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the customer to delete.
member.returns: No content if the deletion was successful.
member.response: If the customer is not found

member.name: T:PerformanceController
member.summary: API controller for retrieving portfolio performance data.

member.name: M:PerformanceController.GetPerformance(System.Int32,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Retrieves the performance metrics for a specific portfolio within a date range.
member.param: The unique identifier of the portfolio.
The start date of the performance period (inclusive).
The end date of the performance period (inclusive).
member.returns: The performance data for the specified portfolio and date range.
member.response: If no performance data is found for the portfolio

member.name: T:PortfoliosController
member.summary: API controller for managing investment portfolios.

member.name: M:PortfoliosController.GetAll
member.summary: Retrieves all portfolios.

member.name: M:PortfoliosController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific portfolio by its ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the portfolio.
member.response: If the portfolio is not found

member.name: M:PortfoliosController.GetByCustomer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves all portfolios for a specific customer, including their assets.
member.param: The unique identifier of the customer.
member.returns: A list of portfolios with associated assets.
member.response: Returns the list of portfolios with assets
If no portfolios are found for the customer

member.name: M:PortfoliosController.Create(PortfolioCreateDto)
member.summary: Creates a new portfolio.
member.param: The portfolio creation data.
member.response: If the input data is invalid

member.name: M:PortfoliosController.Update(System.Int32,PortfolioUpdateDto)
member.summary: Updates an existing portfolio.
member.param: The unique identifier of the portfolio.
The updated portfolio data.
member.response: If the portfolio is not found

member.name: M:PortfoliosController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a portfolio by its ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the portfolio.
member.response: If the portfolio has linked assets
If the portfolio is not found

member.name: M:TransactionsController.Create(TransactionCreateDto)
member.summary: Creates a new transaction.
member.param: Transaction creation data.
member.response: If the asset ID is invalid

member.name: M:TransactionsController.Update(System.Int32,TransactionUpdateDto)
member.summary: Updates an existing transaction.
member.param: Transaction ID.
Updated transaction data.
member.response: If the transaction is not found

member.name: M:TransactionsController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a transaction by its ID.
member.param: Transaction ID.
member.response: If the transaction is not found

member.name: M:TransactionsController.GetByAssetId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all transactions for a specific asset.
member.param: Asset ID.
member.returns: List of transactions linked to the asset.
member.response: If no transactions are found for the asset

member.name: M:TransactionsController.Search(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Searches transactions within a date range with pagination support.
member.param: Start date of the search range.
End date of the search range.
Page number (default 1).
Number of records per page (default 10).
member.returns: Paginated list of transactions and total count.

member.name: M:TransactionsController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a transaction by its ID.
member.param: Transaction ID.
member.response: If the transaction is not found

member.name: T:AssetDto
member.summary: Base DTO representing a general asset.

member.name: P:AssetDto.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier of the asset.

member.name: P:AssetDto.PortfolioId
member.summary: Identifier of the portfolio this asset belongs to.

member.name: P:AssetDto.Ticker
member.summary: Ticker symbol of the asset.

member.name: P:AssetDto.Name
member.summary: Name of the asset.

member.name: P:AssetDto.Type
member.summary: Type of the asset (e.g., Stock, Bond, Fund).

member.name: P:AssetDto.Transactions
member.summary: Collection of all transactions (buys, sells) related to this asset.

member.name: T:StockDto
member.summary: DTO representing a stock asset.

member.name: P:StockDto.Exchange
member.summary: Stock exchange where the stock is listed.

member.name: P:StockDto.Sector
member.summary: Sector the stock belongs to (e.g., Technology, Finance).

member.name: P:StockDto.DividendYield
member.summary: Dividend yield percentage of the stock.

member.name: T:BondDto
member.summary: DTO representing a bond asset.

member.name: P:BondDto.CouponRate
member.summary: Coupon rate percentage of the bond.

member.name: P:BondDto.MaturityDate
member.summary: Maturity date of the bond.

member.name: P:BondDto.Issuer
member.summary: Issuer of the bond.

member.name: P:BondDto.BondType
member.summary: Type of bond (e.g., Government, Corporate).

member.name: T:FundDto
member.summary: DTO representing a fund asset.

member.name: P:FundDto.FundManager
member.summary: Name of the fund manager.

member.name: P:FundDto.FundType
member.summary: Type of fund (e.g., Index, Mutual).

member.name: P:FundDto.ExpenseRatio
member.summary: Expense ratio percentage of the fund.

member.name: T:AssetCreateDto
member.summary: Base DTO for creating an asset.

member.name: P:AssetCreateDto.PortfolioId
member.summary: Portfolio ID to associate this asset with.

member.name: P:AssetCreateDto.Ticker
member.summary: Ticker symbol of the asset.

member.name: P:AssetCreateDto.Name
member.summary: Name of the asset.

member.name: P:AssetCreateDto.Type
member.summary: Type of the asset.

member.name: T:StockCreateDto
member.summary: DTO for creating a stock asset.

member.name: P:StockCreateDto.Exchange
member.summary: Stock exchange where the stock is listed.

member.name: P:StockCreateDto.Sector
member.summary: Sector the stock belongs to.

member.name: P:StockCreateDto.DividendYield
member.summary: Dividend yield percentage of the stock.

member.name: T:BondCreateDto
member.summary: DTO for creating a bond asset.

member.name: P:BondCreateDto.CouponRate
member.summary: Coupon rate percentage of the bond.

member.name: P:BondCreateDto.MaturityDate
member.summary: Maturity date of the bond.

member.name: P:BondCreateDto.Issuer
member.summary: Issuer of the bond.

member.name: P:BondCreateDto.BondType
member.summary: Type of bond.

member.name: T:FundCreateDto
member.summary: DTO for creating a fund asset.

member.name: P:FundCreateDto.PortfolioId
member.summary: Portfolio ID to associate this fund with.

member.name: P:FundCreateDto.Name
member.summary: Name of the fund.

member.name: P:FundCreateDto.Ticker
member.summary: Ticker symbol of the fund.

member.name: P:FundCreateDto.FundType
member.summary: Type of fund.

member.name: P:FundCreateDto.ExpenseRatio
member.summary: Expense ratio percentage of the fund.

member.name: P:FundCreateDto.FundManager
member.summary: Name of the fund manager.

member.name: P:FundCreateDto.Type
member.summary: Type of asset, default is Fund.

member.name: T:AssetPerformanceDto
member.summary: DTO representing the performance of an asset.

member.name: P:AssetPerformanceDto.AssetId
member.summary: Unique identifier of the asset.

member.name: P:AssetPerformanceDto.Name
member.summary: Name of the asset.

member.name: P:AssetPerformanceDto.Ticker
member.summary: Ticker symbol of the asset.

member.name: P:AssetPerformanceDto.Value
member.summary: Current total value of the asset.

member.name: P:AssetPerformanceDto.RealizedGain
member.summary: Total realized gain for the asset.

member.name: P:AssetPerformanceDto.UnrealizedGain
member.summary: Total unrealized gain for the asset.

member.name: T:CustomerDto
member.summary: Data Transfer Object for returning customer details.

member.name: P:CustomerDto.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier of the customer.

member.name: P:CustomerDto.Name
member.summary: Name of the customer.

member.name: T:CustomerCreateDto
member.summary: Data Transfer Object for creating a new customer.

member.name: P:CustomerCreateDto.Name
member.summary: Name of the customer.

member.name: T:CustomerUpdateDto
member.summary: Data Transfer Object for updating an existing customer.

member.name: P:CustomerUpdateDto.Name
member.summary: Name of the customer.

member.name: T:CustomerPortfolioDto
member.summary: DTO representing a customer along with their investment portfolios and associated assets.

member.name: P:CustomerPortfolioDto.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier of the customer.

member.name: P:CustomerPortfolioDto.Name
member.summary: Name of the customer.

member.name: P:CustomerPortfolioDto.Portfolios
member.summary: List of portfolios owned by the customer, each including associated assets.

member.name: T:PerformanceDto
member.summary: Data transfer object representing the performance of a portfolio over a date range.

member.name: P:PerformanceDto.PortfolioId
member.summary: Identifier of the portfolio.

member.name: P:PerformanceDto.StartDate
member.summary: Start date of the performance period.

member.name: P:PerformanceDto.EndDate
member.summary: End date of the performance period.

member.name: P:PerformanceDto.TotalValue
member.summary: Total value of the portfolio at the end of the period.

member.name: P:PerformanceDto.Assets
member.summary: List of individual asset performance within the portfolio.

member.name: P:PerformanceDto.ValueOverTime
member.summary: Historical portfolio value over time during the performance period.

member.name: P:PerformanceDto.Allocation
member.summary: Breakdown of the asset allocation within the portfolio.

member.name: T:ValueOverTimeDto
member.summary: Represents portfolio value on a specific date.

member.name: P:ValueOverTimeDto.Date
member.summary: Date of the valuation.

member.name: P:ValueOverTimeDto.Value
member.summary: Total value of the portfolio on that date.

member.name: T:AssetAllocationDto
member.summary: Represents asset allocation information within a portfolio.

member.name: P:AssetAllocationDto.AssetName
member.summary: Name of the asset.

member.name: P:AssetAllocationDto.Value
member.summary: Current value of the asset.

member.name: P:AssetAllocationDto.AllocationPercentage
member.summary: Percentage allocation of the asset in the total portfolio.

member.name: T:PortfolioDto
member.summary: Represents a portfolio belonging to a customer.

member.name: P:PortfolioDto.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the portfolio.

member.name: P:PortfolioDto.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the portfolio name.

member.name: P:PortfolioDto.CustomerId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the customer who owns the portfolio.

member.name: P:PortfolioDto.Customer
member.summary: Gets or sets the customer who owns the portfolio.

member.name: P:PortfolioDto.Assets
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of assets associated with the portfolio.

member.name: T:PortfolioCreateDto
member.summary: DTO for creating a new portfolio.

member.name: P:PortfolioCreateDto.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the portfolio name.

member.name: P:PortfolioCreateDto.CustomerId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the customer who will own the portfolio.

member.name: T:PortfolioUpdateDto
member.summary: DTO for updating an existing portfolio.

member.name: P:PortfolioUpdateDto.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the updated portfolio name.

member.name: P:PortfolioUpdateDto.CustomerId
member.summary: Gets or sets the updated customer identifier for the portfolio.

member.name: T:PortfolioWithAssetsDto
member.summary: Represents a portfolio along with its associated assets.

member.name: P:PortfolioWithAssetsDto.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the portfolio.

member.name: P:PortfolioWithAssetsDto.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the portfolio.

member.name: P:PortfolioWithAssetsDto.CustomerId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the customer who owns the portfolio.

member.name: P:PortfolioWithAssetsDto.Assets
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of assets associated with this portfolio.

member.name: T:TransactionDto
member.summary: Represents a transaction record for an asset.

member.name: P:TransactionDto.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the transaction.

member.name: P:TransactionDto.AssetId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the related asset.

member.name: P:TransactionDto.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the transaction occurred.

member.name: P:TransactionDto.Quantity
member.summary: Gets or sets the quantity of the asset transacted.

member.name: P:TransactionDto.Price
member.summary: Gets or sets the price per unit for the transaction.

member.name: P:TransactionDto.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of transaction (e.g., Buy or Sell).

member.name: T:TransactionCreateDto
member.summary: DTO for creating a new transaction for an asset.

member.name: P:TransactionCreateDto.AssetId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the related asset.

member.name: P:TransactionCreateDto.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the transaction occurred.

member.name: P:TransactionCreateDto.Quantity
member.summary: Gets or sets the quantity of the asset transacted.

member.name: P:TransactionCreateDto.Price
member.summary: Gets or sets the price per unit for the transaction.

member.name: P:TransactionCreateDto.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of transaction (e.g., Buy or Sell).

member.name: T:TransactionUpdateDto
member.summary: DTO for updating transaction for an asset.

member.name: P:TransactionUpdateDto.Quantity
member.summary: Gets or sets the quantity of the asset transacted.

member.name: P:TransactionUpdateDto.Price
member.summary: Gets or sets the price per unit for the transaction.

member.name: P:TransactionUpdateDto.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of transaction (e.g., Buy or Sell).

member.name: P:TransactionUpdateDto.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the transaction occurred.
